LanguageData.GS_Grail.label: Grail
LanguageData.GS_Grail.description: An artifact of unknown origin that is said to be capable of transforming a common man into a being capable of carrying out miracles with just a single touch. Those who use one for the first time will have their genes completely overwritten, while use afterwards is said to further empower the beings born of the Grail.
